tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>Important!!!</> -> Press <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F1-4</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button to access everthing!
























<TextStyle.Yellow>If you notice a problem, something is out of balance or if you have some wishes, please let us know!</>

tab2.text1:
- <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F1</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button to open Shop menu

- <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Starter kits</> available
- You gain <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">200 Coins every 15 min</>

- We add more stuff from time to time

If you wish something special or have some ideas, please let us know!
tab2.text2:
- <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F2</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button to open Vote menu

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">If you Vote for us you gain up to 2000 extra coins for every Vote!</>


<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">How the Voting works and how you get your Coins automatic?</>
- You find instructions on our Discord under <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Server-Infos</>
- Instructions are in <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">GER</> and <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">EN</>

If you need help, you can ask in Discord or use our Support Tool

tab3.text1:
- Currently working on the fine-tuning for PvE (almost done)
- Create items/kits for new players and integrate them into an ingame store system (done? miss something?)
- Working on Vote rewards and rewards for Events
- Working on more server trailers and advertising
tab3.text2:
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Crossmaps</> in the PvP area (starting with Center Map)
- If wished also in the PvE area
- <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Events</> (if there are enough players)
- PvP Season with videos for the community
- Trailer videos of the server maps
- Discord development
- Create our own community mod

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>No Wipe!</>

- 5x EXP
- 5x Farming
- 5x Taming (2.5x with 2x eat)
- 40x Maturation | 20x Hatching
- 10x Item stack | RawPrimeMeat up to 50
- 10x Weight for Player/Dino
- 20 man Tribe + 3 Alliance
- No Mindwipe cooldown
- Maximum wild dino level 150
- Maximum player level 105
- Enough points for all Engrams
- No movement speed leveling
- NO cave building allowed
- Plattform structure limit 40 > 80
- Dino & Structure decay
- Force wild dino respawn on server restart is enabled
tab4.text2:
Check out our other servers:

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">PVP</>
- RTR [EU] -PVP- x10 | 4Man | Mods | >1<

- RTR [EU] -PVP- x10 | 2Man | Starter Kits | >2<
tab4.text3:
Server restart <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">every day 6 AM</>

- Only wild dino get wiped after restart
- NO WIPE for tamed dinos, boss dinos (tek cave), sleeping dinos, and dinos actively being tamed

tab5.text1:
#1 - If you notice character lagging/rubberband after join

#2 - Flying with Pteranodon feels laggy
tab5.text2:
#1 - Its fixed now! YeY!

#2 - Wait for fix...

tab6.text1: Please remove your taming cages and spikes after a successful tame
tab6.text2:
<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Press F4</> or hold <RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Reload</> button

- You can report other players for cheating or breaking the rules
- Or just to ask the Admins/Mods for help
